Posts.Content: LauraM2972 wrote: After developing another pebble size lump in my areola and the first one still being there I went to the ER I had another ultra sound done that showed a solid mass,,,I'm back on major antibiotics and my biopsy is today,,my anxiety is at an all time high,,this will be the 3rd biopsy I've had in the past 2years on some part of my body,,,,I had to have an emergency hysterectomy just this past march and they thought I had cancer then but the biopsys on the ovaries and everything else came back negative,,,,there's got to be some reason I keep getting sick and developing cysts throughout my body,,,,so frustr Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy today LauraM2972 Moderators

Posts.Content: LauraM2972 wrote: Hi I noticed a sudden lump just beneath my left nipple approximately a month ago,shortly after finding it I began having pain and mass amounts of off white /bloody discharge (mass amounts)I was put on antibiotics and it was cut open to try to drain it more,,,I had a mammogram and ultra sound done and they guided a needle into the (access) thinking it would be full of fluid,,it wasn't. the lump never went away however it did seem to be getting better with no discharge and pain until today,,,I've developed another lump opposite the side of the other one ,,very painful and discharge is beginning again,I'm waiting for my gyno to return my call as to what the next steps are going to be,,,,anyone else have similar symptoms??my husband and I are very anxious Log in to post a reply
